summary: We’re proud to announce that bunny. net is now ISO 27001 certified.  This globally recognized standard highlights our commitment to keeping your data safe and continually making sure your content is hopping faster and safer than ever
title: Raising the bar on security, bunny.net achieves ISO 27001 certification

summary: The datalist element is good.  It was a bit bumpy there for a while, but browser implementations have improved over time.  Now it’s by far the simplest and most robust way to create an autocompleting combobox widget...
title: The datalist element on iOS

summary: It was a pretty stressful and long day at work today.  After work, I usually do a short yoga session at…
title: Conquering the Dread

summary: All good things must come to an end.  For author Dan Moren, nothing is more important than making sure that ending is a damn good one.  Follow along in his Big Idea for the newest addition to his Galactic Cold War series, The Armageddon Protocol, and see for yourself how finite endings really are...
title: The Big Idea: Dan Moren

summary: The United States today unveiled sanctions and indictments against the alleged proprietor of Joker's Stash, a now-defunct cybercrime store that peddled tens of millions of payment cards stolen in some of the largest data breaches of the past decade.  The government also indicted a top Russian cybercriminal known as Taleon, whose cryptocurrency exchange Cryptex has evolved into one of Russia's most active money laundering networks
title: U.S. Indicts 2 Top Russian Hackers, Sanctions Cryptex
